mobs.long_desc: A beast made of black stone is trudging along here.
mobs.desc: The lenitrim's powerful, black frame is dusted with dark sand.  Its movements are silent and efficient in execution, lending to a sense that it is more than capable of holding its own.

mobs.long_desc: A giant black panther with tears in its eyes roams about.
mobs.desc: While this panther appears to be a worthy adversary, you note a subtle sadness to it.  Strong muscles ripple under its dark fur as it slowly pads across the floor.  There is something eerily human-like about its gaze.

mobs.long_desc: A metal skeleton paces about erratically, seeking fresh blood.
mobs.desc: The light here gleams wickedly off of the polished skeleton's form.  Twin pinpoints of red fire emit from the depths of its skull, scanning the area for potential victims.  Its limbs scrape along the corridor as it seeks to fulfill some dark charge.

mobs.long_desc: A figure surrounded in perpetual mist is walking on the ceiling.
mobs.desc: Looking upwards, you note milky white eyes barely visible through the whirling mists which cling to the cronkneb's form.  Disturbingly wet sounds issue from its widely spread toes as it travels across the ceiling, occassionally issuing a demonic howl.

mobs.long_desc: A robed figure observes you as you pass, eyes strangely devoid of life.
mobs.desc: The Walk Sentry wears the ancient robes of neutrality. He returns your gaze unflinchingly, seemingly attempting to discern something about you.

mobs.long_desc: A mage in blue robes stumbles around, a dazed expression on his face.
mobs.desc: As this mage surveys the area, he seems unable to focus on any one thing, a dazed expression forever etched into his features.

mobs.long_desc: A Keeper of Demise floats here, defiantly eyeing you. He snarls, "Thou beslubbering boil-brained varlot!"
mobs.desc: The First Keeper of Demise is a sinewy, cunning figure with several scars visible around his magically crafted armor.

mobs.long_desc: A Keeper of Demise floats here, studying your every move.
mobs.desc: The Second Keeper of Demise is a slim, yet deadly, figure in magically crafted armor. She observes your every move so that she might use this knowledge against you if you attack.

mobs.long_desc: A Keeper of Demise floats here, nervously regarding your weapons. He mutters, "Thou mangled idle-headed hedge-pig!"
mobs.desc: The Third Keeper of Demise is a gaunt, nervous man dressed in magically crafted armor. He shuffles around, hoping not to attract too much attention to himself.

mobs.long_desc: A Keeper of Demise floats here, outraged by this violation. He shouts, "Thou weedy dizzy-eyed malt-worm! Prepare to die!"
mobs.desc: The Fourth Keeper of Demise is a huge man dressed in magically crafted armor. He looks at you with undisguised rage for having gained entrance to the courtyard of the keep.

mobs.long_desc: A Keeper of Demise floats here, unmoved by your presence. She says, "Thou churlish milk-livered pigeon-egg! Leave here at once!"
mobs.desc: The Fifth Keeper of Demise is a rather large woman with a bald head. Magically crafted armor fits snugly over her form, revealing giant muscles and signs of past confrontations.

mobs.long_desc: A Keeper of Demise floats here, sharpening his weapon. He looks up and says, "Thou ruttish ill-breeding vassal!"
mobs.desc: The Sixth Keeper of Demise is adorned with layer upon layer of war trophies. To your disgust, you note several body parts attached to his magically crafted armor.

mobs.long_desc: A small, red sphere circles menacingly.
mobs.desc: The crimson sphere glows with an unholy light as it darts from one location to another.  Occassionally it visibly shakes, at which point you feel a sense of dread building within its radius of influence.

mobs.long_desc: A large, red sphere flares ominously as it hovers nearby.
mobs.desc: This large crimson sphere radiates an evil aura which you can feel attempting to tug on your will.  A brief flicker of blue light rolls across the sphere's surface at odd intervals, strobing views into odd scenes played out across the tines of energy.

mobs.long_desc: A figure in red robes appears out of thin air, howling demonically.
mobs.desc: This figure's cloak hides its visage from the world; yet, it is apparent that whatever lurks beneath the red fabric has long lost any human traits.  Red shards of energy occassionally shoot from its gnarled appendages into the ground over which it floats.

mobs.long_desc: A frustrated, young mage is standing here.
mobs.desc: Hopelessness emits from the frustrated mage.  Imprisonment within the keep has etched deep lines into his face, making him appear several times his true age. He alternates between studying various text and holding his head, as though fighting an invasion of his very thoughts.

mobs.long_desc: An evil looking mage floats past you, gloating over something.
mobs.desc: Voliangloch the Evil appears to alternate between gloating and arguing with himself over some mumbled subject.  It is clear that this mage could have once of been a powerful force for good in the land, but was corrupted somewhere between his initiation and this sad moment.

mobs.long_desc: A massive entity coils about itself, surrounded by a red haze.
mobs.desc: Towering over you, a force mighty in the Art guides its energy towards your extermination.  Tendrils of pure energy slowly retract into the massive, quivering core, coiling about each other in an oddly hypnotic dance of death. A great thrumming coincides with this writhing contraction, a description of it best summed up as a twisted symphony of giant crickets that thunders within this chamber.

mobs.keywords: seb-apprentice apprentice mage blue dazed seb
mobs.long_desc: A mage in blue robes stumbles around, a dazed expression on her face.
mobs.desc: As this mage surveys the area, she seems unable to focus on any one thing, a dazed expression forever etched into her features.

mobs.long_desc: A sickly looking tree seems to be edging its twisted limbs towards you.
mobs.desc: As you study the tree, you note its unnatural state. All of its leaves have long since been shed from its blackened surface, its limbs twisted in evil ways. For some reason, you get the feeling that it is inching towards you.

mobs.long_desc: A knight drags his &1&bbloody&0 body along the trail.
mobs.desc: Approximately six feet in height and wearing heavily soiled light armor, this Paladin's scarred but well toned body speak of a long, hard life leading to this point.  Piercing green eyes capture your attention as he regards you, an urgency barely discernable in their depths.

mobs.long_desc: A terrified dwarven lord hides in the shadows.
mobs.desc: This poor noble dwarf looks like he's been trapped in Cyprianum's maze for ages!  His once fine clothing is torn and soiled beyond repair, but their extremely high quality is still evident.  Dargo's mahogany beard, once probably intricately braided and oiled, is matted with muck and runs twisted every which way.  His eyes dart wildly around in response to sounds you can't hear.

objects.ground: A burnt, metal key floats in the air, seeking a master.

extras.text: The key sways as if on unseen winds, its surface surprisingly smooth even after the burning process it went through.

objects.ground: A key which pulses with blue energy is on the ground here.

extras.text: As you study the blue key, a shock goes through your system. In a moment of silent clarity, you see in your mind's eye some manner of portal which buckles under an unseen force before shattering into a shower of blue splinters. The spell broken, you eye the key warily.

objects.ground: A black key rests on the ground here, slowly fading away.

extras.text: The key appears to be shifting between this reality and another, some unknown force regulating its equilibrium as to not allow it to completely exit this realm.

objects.ground: A key made of dragon bone rests on the ground here.

extras.text: The key appears to be made of a single dragon digit, seeing as one end terminates in a wicked looking talon. The key is uncomfortably warm to the touch.

objects.ground: A blue and white streaked marble ball is at rest on the ground here.

extras.text: The blue and white streaked marble seems to expand and contract as though it were alive. A small shimmer of energy passes over its smooth surface occasionally, almost as if to hint towards its purpose.

objects.ground: A key composed of lightning contained within glass rests here.

extras.text: Looking closer at this phenomena, you observe the chaotic motion of the lightning which has been magically encased in glass. For a brief second, you can almost swear you see a tiny, maniacal figure riding the various tines. Closer inspection just gives you a headache.

objects.ground: A red key shines wetly on the ground here.

extras.text: The key appears to be wet with either some clear or reddish fluid, but attempts at collecting the mystery coating result in wet-feeling hands without any visible sign of the cause!  An unpleasant memory flares in the back of your head only to plague you with its elusive meaning.

objects.ground: A large obsidian mace rests on the ground here.

extras.text: The large, obsidian mace looks as if it's just waiting to crush someone's skull.

objects.short: a bag full of black sand
objects.ground: A bag full of what appears to be black sand has been left here.

extras.text: There is something truly peculiar about this bag of sand. A small voice within your head begs you to leave it alone; yet, another voice -- suspiciously louder -- urges you to discover this bag's secrets!

objects.ground: A large feline's paw rests here, awaiting a sprint.

extras.text: The rather large paw seems to emit the elemental energy of its previous owner. Mere proximity to this item seems to enhance your sense of smell...  You can't help but wonder what other use this item might have...

objects.ground: A shadow in the corner of your vision takes the form of a shield.

extras.text: The shield appears to be made of a bundling of dark matter. It is very clear that it would take a lot to shatter its absorbant surface.

objects.ground: An evil looking black scimitar waits for its master to return.

extras.text: The smooth, blackened surface of this scimitar reflects the half-light of its environment with an evil tinge.  A slight twitching of the blade indicates its desire for fresh blood, encouraging you to note both its power and evil nature.

objects.ground: A pile of blue silk is puddled at your feet.

extras.text: The blue robe of silk has a single, mysterious symbol on its front.  While the image is familiar, you can not place where you have seen it before.
A closer look at the symbol reveals the paw print of a panther superimposed over a balanced scale.

objects.ground: An ancient text has been left here.

extras.text: Quickly scanning through the text, you piece together a tale of good cause corrupted and evil unleashed.  Once the letters begin dancing on the page, you avert your gaze as to not completely lose your mind.

objects.ground: A patch of darkness shimmers next to your feet.

extras.text: Studying the patch of darkness, you realize that it is some manner of light-weight, pliable material.  Thin, yet strong, you realize it would make for excellent armor.  An azure flare passing over its surface occassionally makes it clear as to its origins.
Closer inspection of the flare reveals the image of....a running panther? How odd...

objects.ground: A burnt blade rests on the ground here, waiting to taste blood.

extras.text: The blade seems to reflect darkness off of its burnt, yet smooth, surface.  On the hilt you can barely make out the ancient symbol of the Keepers, the fated souls eventually twisted into serving as the guardians of Demise Keep.

objects.ground: A pool of red silk is draped over the ground here.

extras.text: Darker crimson markings on the silk form a seal upon the fabric.  An aura about the robe emits an evil nature; yet, you feel as though the robe itself were calling to you...  Seeking release.
The markings form a seal on the robe. Closer inspection of the seal reveals its magical nature: an evil set of eyes blinking back at you.

objects.ground: A black, melted mask leaves the imprint of a tortured soul in the earth here.

extras.text: Looking closer at the mask, you eventually make out a horrifying visage giving the artifact its form.  Carved into the inside of the mask is the following: Nilthren mait-uke lukriam ensiv.  You feel something deep within you snap.

objects.ground: A staff engulfed in blue fire stands at attention here.

extras.text: The staff appears to be engulfed in a blue flame, but it remains cool to the touch. Intricate designs have been carved into its magical surface... apparently some type of magical charm which may or may not have worn off with the passage of time.

objects.ground: The dark form of something violates the reality of this space.

extras.text: Looking closer at the dark form, you realize that it is some form of amulet. As if aware of your interest, it flares with a dark light briefly, revealing the following: Lin'trau vendil martook umse. You feel something within you mend and a power from beyond merging with your own.

objects.ground: A wicked-looking rod is embedded in the earth here.

extras.text: Upon closer inspection, there are some words carved into the rod.
In times of strife, my cause was to be known; Bitter tears of regret, clenched tooth to bone. Milnae urthlii, sumalin murtgnai d'ench pa'r... Veteinri Umse YaYa lechniq emt umscuia'r.

objects.ground: A gleaming orb floats a few feet off of the ground here.

extras.text: The orb slowly spins on a random axis, even when held.  Looking deep within its depths, you can almost swear that you see its fluid core swirling about a solitary figure.

objects.ground: Something rests on the ground here, slowly corrupting reality.

extras.text: Looking at the cloak too long gives you a headache.

objects.ground: A giant, well-polished metal chest is here.

extras.text: This chest gleams with the blue ambient light of the orbs surrounding you.  In its polished surface you can see your face reflected, its features appearing ominously greedy.

objects.ground: A pile of gold coins sparkles in the half light.

extras.text: You inspect the coins closer.  There appear to be eight gold coins in the pile.

objects.ground: A non-descript wooden door is floating here.

extras.text: A non-descript wooden door floats here. Brief azure shimmers slide across its surface at odd intervals. Something about their passage leads you to believe this portal will only exist for a few moments.

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_greet
triggers.commands: wait 1s mecho %self.name% coughs loudly. mecho %self.name% screams in frustration! mecho %self.name% says, 'Hey you! wait!' wait 2s mecho %self.name% shouts, 'Wait!' mecho %self.name% coughs loudly, spewing blood. mecho %self.name% says, 'Turn back, it's awful! you will all die!' mecho %self.name% rolls over in fit of bile-filled coughing.

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_speech1
triggers.commands: say monsters....everywhere...too many. cough

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_speech2
triggers.commands: say i am too weak say its...look to the one who cannot... emote spits up blood.

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_speech3
triggers.commands: emote says, 'the blood....all the blood, the monsters.' cough

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_speech4
triggers.commands: wince mecho %self.name% says, 'kill me, don't let them get me!' beg %actor.name%

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_rand1
triggers.commands: mecho %self.name% is mortally wounded and will die soon.

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_rand2
triggers.commands: groan mecho %self.name% says softly 'help me....' mecho %self.name% tries to pull himself off the trail onto a stump so as not to drown in his own blood.

triggers.name: Demise_dying_knight_rand3
triggers.commands: cough mecho %self.name% spews blood and bile from his gaping wounds. mecho %self.name% rolls over and stares blankly at the sky...

triggers.name: Demise_Cyprianum_Greet
triggers.commands: emote coils about itself at your approach! emote booms, "Your life is forfeit! Prepare for battle!" emote ROARS!

triggers.name: Demise_Cyprianum_Combat_1
triggers.commands: emote nearly flails you with a whiplike tentacle of energy! say Your mortality binds you to slower flesh! cackle

triggers.name: Demise_Cyprianum_Combat_2
triggers.commands: emote ROARS! emote crushes the marble just inches from your feet! say Soon you too will be among my slaves!

triggers.name: Demise_Cyprianum_Combat_3
triggers.commands: emote flairs a darker shade of red. say You have no magic which can harm me! emote ROARS!

triggers.name: Demise_Cyprianum_Death_Word_of_Command
triggers.commands: emote roars, 'Time is but a shell...' mecho A non-descript wooden door bursts from Cyprianum! mload obj 43026 set i %actor.group_size% if %i% set a 1 else set a 0 endif while %i% >= %a% set person %actor.group_member[%a%]% if %person.room% == %self.room% if %person.quest_stage[word_command]% == 2 quest advance word_command %person.name% endif elseif %person% eval i %i% + 1 endif eval a %a% + 1 done set room %self.room% if %room.people[43021]% mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[43021]% says, 'At last!!  The way out!' mecho Lord Dargo dashes for the door! mforce dargo enter door endif

triggers.name: Demise_Cronkneb_Combat_1
triggers.commands: emote hisses at you! say My master will reward me for bringing him a fresh soul!

triggers.name: Demise_Cronkneb_Combat_2
triggers.commands: cackle emote mumbles something under its breath.

triggers.name: Demise_Cronkneb_Combat_3
triggers.commands: emote throws back its head and howls! emote bares its fangs at you!

triggers.name: Demise_Magical_Exit_43027
triggers.commands: wsend %actor.name% The magical portal shines even brighter and then fades as you pass through it.

triggers.name: not used - delete
triggers.commands: Nothing.

triggers.commands: if %get.mob_count[43021]% == 0 wzoneecho 430 Someone shouts, 'Help!  Can anyone hear me?!  I'm trapped in the maze!  Help!!' endif

triggers.name: word_command_dargo_preentry_plus_43157
triggers.commands: wsend %actor% Pillars of darkness converge on you, enfolding you in their nothingness! wsend %actor% You feel yourself swept even deeper into the keep. if %get.mob_count[43021]% == 0 wload mob 43021 endif

triggers.name: word_command_dargo_greet
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %self.room% == 43148 if %questor% say Thank the gods you found me again!  Help me get out of here! elseif (%actor.class% /= Priest || %actor.class% /= Diabolist) && %actor.level% > 72 say Oh thank the gods, please help me!  Someone used a scroll mecho &0of World Teleport on me as a joke and I wound up here!' wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'I've been trying desperately to escape this place but every mecho &0time I think I found a way out, the demon reaper who rules this place mecho &0keeps pulling me back.' wait 2s say I don't know how long I've been down here... sob wait 2s say Help me confront the demon and his servants and destroy them! wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'If you can get me out of this hell, I can teach you a mecho &0powerful spell.  Will you help me?' else say Do you have any priestly friends who can protect us from the mecho &0demon who rules this keep??  Or even someone who knows the demonic arts?' endif endif

triggers.name: word_command_dargo_speech1
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %questor% == %actor.name% say Lead on! elseif %actor.has_completed[word_command]% emote stars in wide-eyed terror. wait 2s say Don't I know you already?!  Cyprianum is tormenting me again!! wait 1s mecho %self.name% screams, 'NOOOOOOOO!!!!!' as he runs wildly into the shadows! mpurge %self% elseif (%actor.class% /= Priest || %actor.class% /= Diabolist) && %actor.level% > 72 say Thank you! if !%actor.quest_stage[word_command]% quest start word_command %actor.name% endif set questor %actor.name% global questor fol %actor% else mecho %self.name% says, 'I don't know if you can protect me from the demonic forces mecho &0here...  You'll need in-depth knowledge of demons to get us out of mecho &0here alive!' endif

triggers.name: word_command_dargo_escape
triggers.commands: wait 2 if !%questor% halt endif if %self.room% == 43037 if %get.mob_count[43017]% > 0 mat 43176 mforce cyprianum shout You can never escape me! mecho &1%self.name% vanishes in a flash of light and crimson haze!&0 emote shrieks as he disappears! mecho Cackling laughter echoes through the halls. mteleport %self% 43148 else set i %questor.group_size% if %i% set a 1 else set a 0 endif while %i% >= %a% set person %questor.group_member[%i%]% if %person.room% == %self.room% if %person.quest_stage[word_command]% == 3 set escape 1 endif elseif %person% eval i %i% + 1 endif eval a %a% + 1 done if !%escape% mat 43092 mload mob 43016 mecho Cyprianum the Reaper shouts, 'You didn't think you could escape without confronting me and my servant, did you Dargo?' mat 43176 mload mob 43017 mecho %self.name% shrieks as he vanishes in a flash of light and crimson haze! mteleport %self% 43148 endif endif elseif %self.room% == 43176 if %get.mob_count[43016]% > 0 mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[43016]% shouts, 'I will never allow you to harm my master!' mecho &1&b%self.name% is consumed in a crackle of red lightning and vanishes!&0 mecho Cackling laughter echoes through the maze! mteleport %self% 43148 endif elseif %self.room% == 43000 if %get.mob_count[43017]% > 0 mat 43176 mforce cyprianum shout You can never escape me! mecho &1%self.name% vanishes in a flash of light and crimson haze!&0 emote shrieks as he disappears! mecho Cackling laughter echoes through the halls. mteleport %self% 43148 else cheer say Thank you so much! set i %questor.group_size% if %i% set a 1 else set a 0 endif while %i% >= %a% set person %questor.group_member[%a%]% if %person.room% == %self.room% if %person.quest_stage[word_command]% == 3 t %person% As promised, here is the spell. msend %person% %self.name% gives you a disintegrating scroll with an ancient spell on it. mskillset %person.name% word of command msend %person% &5&bYou have learned Word of Command!&0 quest complete word_command %person.name% elseif %person.vnum% == -1 t %person% To show my gratitude, take this. set count 0 while %count% < 3 set what_gem_drop %random.11% eval gem_vnum %what_gem_drop% + 55736 mload obj %gem_vnum% eval count %count% + 1 done give all.gem %person% endif elseif %person% eval i %i% + 1 endif eval a %a% + 1 done mecho %self.name% waves farewell! mpurge %self% endif endif

triggers.name: word_command_voliangloch_death

triggers.name: word_command_dargo_kill
triggers.commands: set room %self.room% set person %room.people% while %person% if %person.vnum% != -1 && %person.vnum% != 43021 if !%person.flagged[illusory]% mforce %person% say You will never escape this place, Dargo! mforce %person% kill %self% endif endif set person %person.next_in_room% done

triggers.name: word_of_command_dargo_order
triggers.commands: if %arg% /= enter door if %actor.quest_stage[word_command]% == 3 if %self.room% == 43176 enter door else mecho %self.name% looks frantically for a door and panics! endif elseif %actor.quest_stage[word_command]% say I'm not free from the curse yet! endif else return 0 endif

triggers.name: Demise_BlueOrbs_Racing
triggers.commands: wsend %actor% What seems like hundreds of small, blue orbs circle about here. wsend %actor% A group of these race towards you, quickly surrounding you! wsend %actor% The corridor is suddenly illuminated by an ambient glow.

triggers.name: Demise_BlueOrbs_Abandon
triggers.commands: wsend %actor% You are plunged into darkness as the small, blue orbs abandon you!

triggers.name: Demise_Treasure_Trap
triggers.commands: wsend %actor% You have fallen into a magical trap! wsend %actor% Reality ripples and you feel yourself magically transported!

triggers.name: Demise_Magical_Exit_43128
triggers.commands: wsend %actor% Wisps of smoke rise from a spot on the northern wall.

triggers.name: Demise_43157_Magical_Exits
triggers.commands: wsend %actor% Pillars of darkness converge on you, enfolding you in their nothingness! wsend %actor% You feel yourself swept even deeper into the keep.

triggers.name: Demise_Keeper_NoEntry
triggers.commands: msend %actor% %self.name% steps in your way. mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% moves toward the door, but %self.name% steps in %actor.p% way. msend %actor% %self.name% eyes you warily. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% eyes %actor.name% warily. say None shall pass but those of our order. say Turn back, traveller...live your days well.

triggers.name: Demise_Exit_Portal
triggers.commands: wsend %actor.name% A hole torn in the fabric of reality shimmers above you.

triggers.name: Demise_Keeper_Bloodlust
triggers.commands: grin say I'm going to enjoy taking you out! emote springs into motion!

triggers.name: Demise_Keeper_Outrage
triggers.commands: gasp say You were warned!

triggers.name: Demise_StaffSeblan_Fire
triggers.commands: oecho Blue flames enfold %actor.name%, the master of the Staff of Seblan!

triggers.name: Demise_BlackScimitar_Wield
triggers.commands: oecho Shadows appear over %actor.name%, so vivid that they seem tangible. oecho Suddenly they dive into %actor.name%'s body, merging with %actor.p% soul!

triggers.name: Demise_AckbrinRun_Restrict
triggers.commands: frown say You are not of our order. emote folds his arms across his chest, blocking the way.

rooms.name: Beginning of Deimos Path
rooms.description: You stand at the beginning of Deimos Path, the sole manner of reaching the mythical Demise Keep.  Dense lines of trees block your view of the path beyond the bend, but in the distance you can make out the remains of the magical fortress once known as The Towers of Votkno.  An unnatural sense of sadness fills you as you compare the vibrant forests to the burnt structure.  You may either journey along the path to the south or travel northward on the Obsidian Path.

North.description: You can see an intersection just to the north.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You are walking along Deimos Path, the only manner of entry into Demise Keep.  To either side of you, natural life strives to maintain the balance of Nature; however, each glance towards the ruined structure of the keep dispels this harmony for you.  You can't help but wonder at the evil which brought about such destruction.  From this point, you can go either south towards the keep, or north -- away from this sad place.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You are walking along Deimos Path, the only manner of entry into Demise Keep. Lush forest can be seen to the east and west. To the south, the magical keep awaits your arrival, its burnt remains contrasting with the otherwise beautiful landscape. From this point,  you can either go to the south or to the north.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You are walking along Deimos Path, the only manner of entry into Demise Keep. To either side of you, natural life strives to maintain the balance of Nature, with the silent mass of Demise Keep seeming to be the only opposition. Further to the south, the path bends towards the west. To the north, the path continues towards the outside world.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You have reached a turn in Deimos Path.  Surveying the surrounding forest, you sense -- more than see -- an evil slowly killing the land.  Perhaps it is in the unnatural bends in the trees...or maybe the lack of any of the life that was evident at the beginning of the path.  You can either continue towards the Keep to the west or go to the north.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along an east-west stretch of Deimos Path. The forest surrounding you seems to be fighting against some hidden disease, tree limbs disfigured and an obvious lack of the wildlife present to the north. From this point, you can either go to the east or the west.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along an east-west stretch of Deimos Path. The forest surrounding you has lost the glow of life and you are beginning to get a true sense of the manner of evil at play here.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along an east-west stretch of Deimos Path.  The scenery around the path is drastically changed at this point.  Rank upon rank of trees within the forest are without leaves and the boughs appear to be charred at some points.  One sight in particular really disturbs you: a half finished romantic carving in one of the trees which happens to have a boot sticking out from the bark beside it.  From this point, you can either go to the east or the west.

extras.text: The boot simply seems to be protruding from the tree's bark. Upon closer inspection, you note -- quite to your horror -- that the owner is still wearing it.
The carving in the tree reads: "Tear drops on the sweet Kiwanis of this sunset..."

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along an east-west stretch of Deimos Path. The forest surrounding you has lost the glow of life and you are beginning to get a true sense of the manner of evil at play here.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself at another bend in Deimos Path.  From here you have a clear view of the Keep to the south.  The path continues to the south towards Demise Keep or you can leave this place by travelling eastward.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along the the penultimate stretch of Deimos Path towards Demise Keep.  At this point you can either continue to the south or away from the keep to the north.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along the the penultimate stretch of Deimos Path towards Demise Keep.  At this point you can either continue to the south or away from the keep to the north.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along the penultimate stretch to the mythical Demise Keep. At this point, the path passes one of the giant walls of the keep to the east. Looking up at the positions of defense high on the wall, you can almost see the ranks of sorcerers as they protected their once beautiful fortress.  From this point, you can either go to the north or the south.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along the penultimate stretch to Demise Keep.  At this point, the path passes one of the keep's giant walls.  Roughly a quarter of the way up the structure, you see a large hole burned into the wall's side. Additional rubble spread out in this area confirms that some major explosion tore through the defenses at this location.  From this point, you can go to the north or the south.

rooms.name: Deimos Path
rooms.description: You find yourself along the penultimate stretch to Demise Keep.  At this point, you are near to the southwestern corner of the keep.  A bit further to the south, the path turns to the east.  From this point, you can go to the north or the south.

rooms.name: The Sentient Barrier
rooms.description: To the south, an imposing wall of giant thorns is growing from the shattered path.  Upon closer examination, it looks like it is covering a thorny tunnel of sorts which leads around the corner towards the keep's entrance; however, it looks like you might be able to slip through one of the gaps visible in this impressive barrier.

rooms.name: The Sentient Barrier
rooms.description: Passage to the north has been denied by what appears to be a sentient cluster of thorns.  You find yourself in a tunnel composed of the same material, but which also encompasses portions of the surrounding forest.  The ramp leading towards the entrance proper of Demise Keep continues to the east, ascending within its thorny guide.

rooms.name: Ascent of Horror
rooms.description: You find yourself slowly ascending a ramp towards the entrance of Demise Keep.  Any pretense of life in the surrounding forest has been abandoned.  The drained husks of trees seem to be holding a silent, ominous vigil in honor of the downfall of Demise Keep.  From this point, you can either go to the east or the west.

rooms.name: Ascent of Horror
rooms.description: You find yourself slowly ascending a ramp towards the entrance of Demise Keep.  The land surrounding you is devoid of life, the earth populated at ominous intervals by the scorched, skeletal remains of trees.  You can't help but view them as a silent army lost in this desolate place.  To the north, the massive outer wall of Demise Keep towers above you.  From this point, you can either go to the east or the west.

rooms.name: Ascent of Horror
rooms.description: You find yourself on a ramp which ascends toward the entrance of Demise Keep.  A small wall blocks your view of the forest to the south.  To the east, you see that the entrance is near, as the ramp turns to the north.  The ramp descends to the west, eventually turning into a path which bends at the southwest corner of the keep.

rooms.name: Before the Gateway of Demise Keep
rooms.description: You find yourself at the final turn to reach Demise Keep. To the north, the colossal gates of the ruined fortress greet you with indifference. A strange distortion in the air ripples before the burnt metal, casting strangely humanoid shadows against the gateway. A sturdy drawbridge presents the only means of reaching the gateway. To either side of the span, there appears to be a deep pit. From this point, you can either go north or west.

rooms.name: The Drawbridge of Demise Keep
rooms.description: You currently stand on a drawbridge before the gates of Demise Keep. To either side of you, a greenish cauldron flows, offering brief glimpses of the skeletons of various unfortunate creatures -- your occasional human included. Looking to the north, the gateway appears even more massive than it had as viewed from the south. You can either go north to the gates or south to find a way out of this dismal place.

rooms.name: The Gateway to Demise Keep
rooms.description: You find yourself dwarfed by the massive and ancient gates of Demise Keep. Through the blackened metal, you can make out the ruins of several towers as well as what appears to once have been a central spire.  An evil wind from the north transports the stale stench of death left over by whatever force brought about this destruction.  You can enter the keep through the northern gate or leave this place by travelling south.

rooms.name: Inside Demise Keep
rooms.description: Here, the smell of death saturates the air and it does not pass your notice that the courtyard is littered with charred remains.  Skulls impaled upon iron stakes greet you as you examine the keep proper.  There remains a hint of fresh air to the south, through a massive gate.  To the north, there appears to be passage beneath the arch formed by two fallen towers.

rooms.name: Between the Towers
rooms.description: You have reached a clearing which reveals a path further to the north through a dark archway and another path leading to the east where it apparently slopes into darkness beyond the curve of one of the towers.

North.description: A dull bluish glow can be seen pulsing from beyond the archway.

East.description: Listening carefully, you can hear a strange noise coming from this direction...a rather dark passage descending into the unknown.

rooms.name: Cul-de-Sac of Demise Keep
rooms.description: The path abruptly ends in a cul-de-sac created by the fused remains of several fallen towers. Here, the chaotic destruction set loose upon this place is clearly illustrated by the various human limbs reaching from the charred mass. You try not to stare at those faces frozen in anguish as they were sealed into the very keep's structure. Perfectly centered within this enclosure is a blue pentagram atop a slate of black marble. The only apparent exit is to the south.

Down.description: A blue pentagram sits on top of a slate of black marble.

extras.text: A blue pentagram sits on top of a slate of black marble.

rooms.name: Winding Path into Darkness
rooms.description: As you follow the curve of the fallen tower, you eventually come to a polished marble stairwell which leads downward into darkness. All attempts at discerning what is beyond the darkness are futile and you realize that the only way which you will ever find out what exists under this charred earth is to venture below and experience it for yourself.

rooms.name: The Escape Portal
rooms.description: Dark marble walls surround you, offering only one direction in which to continue.  Standing in the silence, you take note of the ambient illumination without discernable source.  It is clear that magic courses through everything here.

rooms.name: Beginning of the Nogatoshic Descent
rooms.description: Surveying this corridor, you note that it moves deeper into the earth under Demise Keep, a smooth tunnel composed of black marble descending into the horrors of this place.  You can either return to the surface by going up or brave the depths of the keep by going eastward.

rooms.name: The Nogatoshic Descent
rooms.description: The small, blue orbs follow your progress as you walk through the passageway. You find yourself on the Nogatoshic Descent, moving deeper into the earth. You can't help but admire the effort and skill which went into constructing these beautiful tunnels beneath the Keep. The harsh climate of the upper portion of the Keep is forgotten as you proceed. Surprisingly, the walls are warm to the touch and you imagine you hear a soft sigh issue from deep within them every so often.  From this point, you can go either east or west.

rooms.name: The Nogatoshic Descent
rooms.description: The small, blue orbs follow your progress as you walk through the passageway. You find yourself at an almost level portion of the descent. At this point, the smoothly crafted marble domes slightly and you note certain aberrations in the coloring of the walls. Looking closer, you slowly make out the horrific outlines of human forms imbedded into the walls. Mouths agape, frozen in silenced screams as whatever force bound them within the stone, you know for certain that their deaths were not pleasant. A strip of the floor here glows with an ominous red tinge, a beacon which seems to brighten as you near it. From this point, you can go either east or west.

Down.description: The black marble glows with an eerie red light.

extras.text: The black marble glows with an eerie red light.

rooms.name: The Nogatoshic Descent
rooms.description: The small, blue orbs follow your progress as you walk through the passageway. You find yourself on the Nogatoshic Descent, moving deeper into the earth. You can't help but admire the effort and skill which went into constructing these beautiful tunnels beneath the Keep. The harsh climate of the upper portion of the Keep is forgotten as you proceed. Surprisingly, the walls are warm to the touch and you imagine you hear a soft sigh every now and then. From this point, you can go either east or west.

You can't help but admire the effort and skill which went into constructing these beautiful tunnels beneath the Keep. The harsh climate of the upper portion of the Keep is forgotten as you proceed. Surprisingly, the walls are warm to the touch and you imagine you hear a soft sigh every now and then. From this point, you can go either east or west.

You can't help but admire the effort and skill which went into constructing these beautiful tunnels beneath the Keep. The harsh climate of the upper portion of the Keep is forgotten as you proceed. Surprisingly, the walls are warm to the touch and you imagine you hear a soft sigh every now and then. From this point, you can go either east or west.

You can't help but admire the effort and skill which went into constructing these beautiful tunnels beneath the Keep. The harsh climate of the upper portion of the Keep is forgotten as you proceed. Surprisingly, the walls are warm to the touch and you imagine you hear a soft sigh every now and then. From this point, you can go either east or west.

rooms.description: The small, blue orbs follow your progress as you walk through the passageway. You find yourself on the Nogatoshic Descent, moving deeper into the earth. You can't help but admire the effort and skill which went into constructing these beautiful tunnels beneath the Keep. The harsh climate of the upper portion of the Keep is forgotten as you proceed. Surprisingly, the walls are warm to the touch and you imagine you hear a soft sigh every now and then. From this point, you can go either east or west.

rooms.name: The Nogatoshic Descent
rooms.description: The small blue orbs follow your progress as you walk through the passageway. You find yourself on an extremely steep portion of the descent, moving deeper into the earth. Looking around you, you can't help but note the beauty of this tunnel, although something tells you that the creation of this place was nowhere near as subtle. From this point, you can go either east or west.

rooms.name: End of the Nogatoshic Descent
rooms.description: A massive obsidian door is embedded within the north wall, and a smaller door is to the south.  To the north, you can barely make out a dull pounding, as if from a mighty war drum.  To the south, you hear the maudlin sobs of some wretched soul.  Strangely, there seems to be a fresh breeze coming from the east.

North.description: A massive obsidian door blocks your progress to the north.

East.description: The wall to the east has several dark cracks in it which seem to fade in and out of view. Upon each revelation, a fresh breeze cools your battle-worn body, encouraging you to leave this place.

South.description: A small door is set within the southern wall.

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Sand Corridor
rooms.description: You stand at the beginning of a long corridor which is composed of moving sand.  The black marble walls have somehow begun to grind upon themselves, producing black grains of sand which have pooled on the floor.  Swirls in the collection move at a constant rate to the east, as though following a tide. To the south, an obsidian door offers an escape from this madness.  Otherwise, you can continue to the west down the corridor.

South.description: A massive door faces you to the south.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

extras.text: You clear a path around the object with your hands as to get a better look. To your surprise, the outline is that of a humanoid face made of living stone. The sightless eyes of this being open and with the sound of stone grinding, it gives you its message: Keep your guard for those who the Magic has set free. Though my Master is strong, I still can advise thee. Stay away from that which is warned ahead... Seblan the Young's redemptive light shall shed The illusion of safety which extolls Death's fee. Speed to your cause now...please, hurry!

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

extras.text: You look into the mirror and fix your hair -- what a mess! Giving a couple variations of your charming smile, you study the reflective surface. Slowly, an image forms of a blue robed man and a giant red entity situated before the remains of a magical frame. Although you can not hear what is being said, you can discern that the man is quite agitated and perhaps even a bit scared. The magical being, on the other hand, flairs occasionally in what you interpret to be stages of rage. It is clear that this poor human is on the losing end of this argument. Tendrils of energy slowly twine and merge into a giant whip-like form over the magical being. Then the band of energy flicks the charged air and ... the image vanishes, only to reflect the confusion in your eyes.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  At this point, the corridor shifts, offering passage to the north or east.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  From this point you can continue to the south or east.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through a corridor composed of moving sand.  The sound of the marble walls grinding to produce yet more sand fills the air.  From this point you can continue to the east or west.

rooms.name: The End of the Sand Corridor
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you survey your surroundings.  You are at one end of a corridor composed of moving sand.  To the north, a black door made of an unidentifiable material is set into the marble wall.  On its surface is magical rune with a strange red symbol superimposed over it.  A dull thrumming can be heard from just beyond this door.  From this point, you can either go north through the door or continue along the corridor of moving sand to the west.

North.description: The door to the north seems to hum as you move closer to it.

rooms.name: Dead End in the Treasure Vault
rooms.description: You have reached a dead end in the passageway.  The only apparent exit is to the east.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: A deafening thrumming which obviously originates from the north surrounds you as you face a large portal set into the northern wall.  Slivers of light spill from the portals boundaries, perhaps from whatever plane happens to be on the other side.  To the east, the corridor extends into darkness.

North.description: A large frame rests against the wall, obviously some manner of portal or gateway. Studying the light spilling from its boundaries, you note the crimson tinge as well as a sense of menace.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming which seems to be increasing in volume surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. To the west, you can discern a sliver of light coming from what appears to be a door in the northern wall. To the east, the corridor extends into darkness.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming which seems to be increasing in volume surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. The eastern portion of this corridor seems to terminate after a short distance. To the west, the corridor extends into relative darkness and you think you can see a sliver of light a good distance away.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze.  A thrumming surrounds you which seems to be building in volume as you survey your environment.  Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth.  Attempts at identifying the composition of these structures are useless.  The corridor turns at this point, offering passage either to the north or the west.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. You have reached a dead end in the passageway with the only apparent exit to the east.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze.  A loud thrumming surrounds you as you survey the massive walls rising into the forbidding darkness.  From this point, you have several directions in which you can travel.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. To the east, you can see a door in the southern wall. Further to the west, the passageway apparently ends.

rooms.name: Entrance to Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you survey the expanse before you.  The scale of this chamber is amazing, black marble walls twisting and turning as they rise into darkness.  A door made of an unidentifiable material is to the south.  Otherwise, the only apparent exits are to the north and west.

East.description: Upon closer inspection, you discern a panel cleverly crafted into the dark marble wall.

South.description: The door to the south seems to hum as you move closer to it. It also seems to have black sand pooling at its base.

rooms.name: Dead End in the Treasure Vault
rooms.description: You have reached a dead end in the passageway.  A thrumming noise sounds as though it comes from the west.  For some reason, grains of black sand are on the ground here.  The only apparent exit is to the east.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You find yourself in a passageway carved from black marble.  A heavy black dust coats the floor, various footprints suggesting that you might not be alone within these corridors.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. Suddenly a portion of the wall flairs and bright orange words hover before you. From this point, it appears as though the corridor continues to the north and the south. There appears to be a dead end to the west.

extras.text: The bright orange words read: Beware you to which the Magic calls, From colder realms within these halls, A twist of fate, the priceless slip, With this direction, tighten your grip. For null ends lure the ignorant soul, Thy life to be reaped as an evil goal.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. You have reached a dead end in the passageway with the only apparent exit to the east.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. From the eastern wall, an orange light flares and words materialize in front of you. To the south, the corridor appears to end. The northern portion of the passageway extends into darkness.

extras.text: The bright orange words read: Though righter words were never spoken, To aid thy cause, journey left not token... What is right is wrong in the major scheme, Bound to conjure up the demon's scream. The flair of darkness bright my soul behold, Just as previous regions labeled as cold... Heed the words of my maudlin soul, Free my spirit and reach thy goal!

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Shadows writhe in your view, a visual cue as to the potential for nastiness here.  The only apparent exit is to the west.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs light your way as you travel through Cyprianum's Maze. A loud thrumming surrounds you as you survey your environment. Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless. To the east, an eerie darkness waits for you. The passageway to the south seems to end in a dead end while that to the north extends into darkness.

rooms.name: Cyprianum's Void
rooms.description: Here darkness has manifested into a tangible plane.  Shadows swirling about you shake occasionally, in time with an almost deafening thrumming.  A colossal structure of what appear to be metal links can be seen to the west.

rooms.name: Voliangloch's Personal Abyss
rooms.description: You find yourself within a chamber composed of giant metal links.  Caught within several of these are skeletons dressed in torn red robes.  Trapped beyond are other red-robed figures, begging for release.  As you watch, bursts of energy escape their bodies and are devoured by the void.  Somehow, you know that it is these tortured souls which fuel this magical place.  The only apparent exit is to the east.

rooms.name: A Hidden Room within Cyprianum's Maze
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs hover about you as you survey this space.  The soft, blue light of their forms radiates throughout this room, outlining various carvings within the black marble.  The only apparent exit is to the west.

extras.text: The smooth, black marble walls of this chamber have several carvings on their surface, apparently images outlining historical events.  Starting from the center of the northern wall, the story unravels in a spiralling layout.  It originates with what appears to be a group of sorcerers seating in a semi-circle of thrones.  While thirteen sit attentive to an apparent leader, another eleven appear to have their heads turned away.  The next scene depicts the same groups, but now a symbol has been placed between them.  The dividing rune looks spherical from its representation and appears to emit some form of energy from which the sorcerers shield themselves.  The next image shows a large, tentacled form with various magical script around it.  Smaller forms cluster around the base of this dominant figure, lines streaking from their forms indicating some sort of motion.  The next carving illustrates a magical battle of epic proportions.  You can recognize the depictions of various spells and techniques as the previously divided sorcerers unite to fight the new threat.  The final image consists of an entire wall of ancient script with the following words at the base:. Nogatotum Guardia Cyprianum

Massive walls rise into the forbidding darkness, concealing the secrets of this labyrinth. Attempts at determining the composition of these structures are useless.  With an evil flair, a set of words composed of red fire appear before you, their crucial message revealed.  The corridor branches at this point allowing you to either enter the darkness of the north or the south, as well as allowing you passage to the eastward corridor.

extras.text: The red words of fire read: Perhaps the last but not the last This riddle is meant to aid you. Take one step back along this path; Yet no steps beyond the two. Choose your direction wise of mind. Pray to your deity, good fortune you'll find.

rooms.description: You find yourself at the core of Cyprianum's Domain.  Dominating the western wall is a large pile of champion remains, apparently crushed into strange formations by the ancient entity.  Occassionally a burst of energy enters this space, charging the air before slowly losing its power.  To the east, marble has been melted into a smooth ramp which ascends through a rift in the ceiling.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: You find yourself in a passageway carved from red marble. Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. The sound of a weeping man continues somewhere to the west. The western portion of the tunnel descends further into the keep while there appears to be a door in the northern wall a bit to the east.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: You find yourself in a passageway carved from red marble. Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. Echoes of a maudlin soul seem to be coming from further down the corridor. The passageway continues to the east and the west.

rooms.name: The Beginning of Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs float here, illuminating the way.  You find yourself at the beginning of a long corridor known as Ackbrin Run.  Rumor has it that it was this very passage that Seblan the Young fled down once he realized that the fortress was lost.  It is said that at intervals along the passageway, you can find the product of each of his tears, having been influenced by the wild magical forces which led to the destruction of the towers above.  The rumors also claim that the tortured soul of Seblan, held prisoner by the magic of this evil place, still haunts the lower levels of the keep.  Echoes of the mage's weeping seem to support this.  From this point, you can either travel along the passageway to the west or go through a door set in the northern wall.

North.description: A massive door faces you to the north.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You have reached a turn in Ackbrin Run. The sobbing continues somewhere further into the keep. From this point, you can either go east or south.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: You find yourself in a passageway carved from red marble. Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. Echoes of a maudlin soul seem to be coming from further down the corridor. The passageway continues to the east and the west.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You have reached another turn in Ackbrin Run. The sobbing continues somewhere further into the keep; yet, it seems to be getting louder. From this point, you can either go west or north.

rooms.name: Seblan's Chamber
rooms.description: You are standing within a giant chamber made of black marble.  Immediately in front of you is a massive semi-circle of thrones.  A deathly silence has fallen over the chamber and you sense a power building.  Looking about, you note a shimmering portal to the north and a darker portal to the south; both magical in nature.  From this point, you can enter either of the portals to the north or south, or go eastward.

North.description: The light portal shimmers and almost seems to emit a high pitched ringing.

South.description: The dark portal gleams wickedly in the half-light, beckoning those who have little care for their lives.

rooms.name: Seblan's Chamber
rooms.description: You are standing within a giant chamber made of black marble, but which is lined with the same unidentifiable material as the corridor a ways to the east. Words composed of a dark fire scroll against the wall to the south while words apparently made of smoke scroll against the wall to the north.  Nearby to the west, a massive semi-circle of thrones can be seen.  Through the poor illumination of this chamber, you think you see a figure slouched in the central throne.  From this point, you can either go east or west.

extras.text: The words composed of the dark fire read: Though set in cause were Seblan and his order, Our task, as opposed, came to bear anew. Racing to the Tower of Voliangloch, Our plot of disruptive Magic slowly grew. As the Gateway churned, screaming for release, The Great Voliangloch did unify our hate. Giant bolt made of maliciously azure fire, Would be the end of Seblan and this debate.

The words composed of smoke read: Brooding on the boundaries of Mayhem My thoughts made dull through the eons A spark of Magic did awaken my sense Ah, these ignorant, little peons! My form in flight towards the light, My goal the freedom of yesterday... I breached the barrier upon pinpoint made, Smashing all wards keeping me from play. Summoning my children through the rift, A tendril's worth of reality in my grip... I restored my order of timeless reign, And from the zealous mortals, life did slip.

rooms.name: Seblan's Chamber
rooms.description: You are standing within a giant chamber made of black marble, but which is lined with the same unidentifiable material as the corridor further to the east.  Words composed of fire scroll against the wall to the north while words apparently made of ice scroll against the wall to the south.  Further to the west, a semi-circle of marble thrones can be seen.  Blinking, you could almost swear that you see someone sitting in the central throne.  From this point, you can either go east or west.

extras.text: The words composed of ice read: From the mouth of our liege ran the wondrous words: The Language of Magic, leaping from tongue. Mighty Gateway reopened and bounds revised, To other planes called Seblan the Young. Stirrings of power, then the Great Crash... Thrown into disorder, the order was crushed, The Gateway shattered, screaming Demise. Cyprianum, a product of Magic trusted; Yet, twisted into another plane... As dark minions overcame the powerful defenses Our order's souls were easily slain.

The words made of fire read: With time laid bare in that crucial moment, The neutral robes retreated to S'ien Tower. Gateway composed and strength combined With force magnified by each present power, The spell began of noble intent, Though its result we have come to resent; Yet, of the darkness, all were prepared, Their might too was also shared. The clash of the forces, a massive War, Wards of the Gateway, smashing the core... The magic did leap and do its Master's bidding; Yet, no one now knew which Master was fitting. From the darkness of fire emerged a darker being, Cyprianum, the Entity of Reaping.

rooms.name: Entrance to Seblan's Chamber
rooms.description: You find yourself in a large chamber made of black marble, but which is lined with the strange material of the corridor to the east.  A heavy mist awaits you on the eastward side of the portal, obviously held back by some form of Magic.  To the west, the chamber continues, faintly illuminated by small, blue orbs which follow your progress as you journey.  At the far end of the chamber, you make out a large semi-circle of nine thrones, apparently made of differentially colored marble.  There is a haze around this area which restricts a better view.  From this point, you can either go through the portal to the east or go further into Seblan's Chamber to the west.

rooms.name: The Depths of Demise Keep
rooms.description: You find yourself at the end of a corridor filled with mist.  Blue shards of lightning arc from a portal set into the western wall, strangely lacking any manner of report.  The subtle buzz of heated conversation seems strongest at this point, seemingly from beyond the portal.  To the east, shadows remain respectively at bay, not wishing to anger whatever force has rule of this portion of the keep.

West.description: A large blue portal stands to the west.

rooms.name: The Depths of Demise Keep
rooms.description: You find yourself within a corridor which is flooded to about your knees. A heavy mist obscures your view of the rest of the corridor; yet, you can hear "things" moving through the water ahead.  Occasionally, you can hear scraping sounds and heavy breathing which seem to be close to you.  Shadows ahead are briefly dispelled as small bursts of lightning -- strangely lacking thunder -- strike the walls to the northwest.  The slight buzzing of conversation can be heard every now and then.  From this point you can either go to the east or the west.

rooms.name: Wind in Seblan's Descent into Darkness
rooms.description: You find yourself along a winding ramp leading into the very depths of Demise Keep.  A heavy mist obscures your view of the winding corridor, maintaining the mystery as to the source -- or sources -- of the rather ominous noises echoing throughout the passageway.  From this point, you can either go to the west or the south.

rooms.name: Wind in Seblan's Descent into Darkness
rooms.description: You find yourself along a winding ramp leading into the very depths of Demise Keep.  A heavy mist obscures your view of the winding corridor.  From this point, you can either go to the west or the north.

rooms.name: Seblan's Descent into Darkness
rooms.description: You find yourself travelling within a corridor made of an unknown material. A heavy mist is settling here, slightly obscuring your view of the corridor. Occassionally, you can hear scraping sounds and heavy breathing which seem to be close to you.  Shadows flicker in your peripheral vision, fleeing upon your investigation.  The mist deepens to the east as the corridor descends, while the west offers a clearer view.

rooms.name: Seblan's Descent into Darkness
rooms.description: You find yourself traveling within a corridor made of an unknown material. A heavy mist obscures your view of the rest of the corridor and it is quiet now except for the occasionally sound of padded feet upon the slick floor.  The passageway slowly descends even further into the keep towards the east.  To the west, the passageway ascends to a southern turn.

rooms.name: A Turn in Seblan's Walk
rooms.description: You have reached another turn in Seblan's Walk.  Looking around, you note a heavy cloud of mist which hangs over the corridor to the east.  The slow dripping noise seems to originate somewhere in that obscured direction.  From this point, you can either go east or south.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You have reached a turn in Ackbrin Run. The sobbing continues somewhere further into the keep. From this point, you can either go west or south.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You have reached a turn in Ackbrin Run. The sobbing continues somewhere further into the keep. From this point, you can either go east or south.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. Echoes of a maudlin soul seem to be coming from somewhere in the southeast. Surveying the area, you note that the passageway seems to have domed at this point and etched on the western wall in a foreign script are a few lines. The passageway continues to the north and the south.

extras.text: The script reads: Nogatotum verim cantra fulfir. Moodrem separul nogatoshis.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: You find yourself in a passageway carved from red marble. Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. Echoes of a maudlin soul seem to be coming from further down the corridor. The passageway continues to the north and the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in Seblan's Walk
rooms.description: You have reached a turn in Seblan's Walk.  Peering about you, there seems to be a deeper cover of mist to the north.  A slow dripping noise repeats in the confines of this passageway while a continuous growl keeps you alert to danger. From this point, you can either go to the east or the north.

rooms.name: Seblan's Walk
rooms.description: You find yourself travelling within a corridor made of an unknown material , through a heavy mist.  The floor is slippery and you find that you need to concentrate on your passage.  A dripping noise can be just barely be heard over a continuous low growl which seems to be building somewhere to the west. Seblan's walk continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Beginning of Seblan's Walk
rooms.description: You find yourself at the beginning of a very dark corridor.  A heavy mist obscures your view; yet, from the sounds presented to you, it is clear that this portion of the keep is rather large.  A steady dripping noise can be heard, apparently coming from the west.  From this point, you can either go westward or go through the doorway to the south.

rooms.name: The End of Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway.  You have reached the end of Ackbrin Run.  Suddenly, the rather annoying sobs terminate and you are left in silence broken by an occasional dripping noise.  To the north, a massive, blood-red door dominates the wall.  On its surface glow spidery words of magic.  You note that you can either venture through a door to the north or travel down the passageway to the west.

extras.text: The spidery words unravel to transport their message: Cast for the subversion of strife, The spell let its spiral fly free. Amidst the chaos of runes bright... Evil minions cackled with glee. No more the master, now the slave, Young Seblan fell into said state. No longer a fool, yet not improved, Maudlin soul forever behind this gate.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: You find yourself in a passageway carved from red marble. Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. Echoes of a maudlin soul seem to be coming from further down the corridor. The passageway continues to the east and the west.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You find yourself in a passageway carved from red marble. Suddenly, the loud sobbing trails into a low echo, emphasizing the otherwise quiet atmosphere of this place. The passageway continues to the east and the west.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You find yourself along the final stretch of Ackbrin Run. The nearly deafening sounds of a weeping man are starting to give you a headache. You pray to your favorite deity to free you from this torture. From this point, you can either go east or west.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You have reached another turn in Ackbrin Run. At this point the sobbing has taken on an almost deafening volume, without showing any signs of ending soon. From this point, you can either go east or north.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You have reached a turn in Ackbrin Run. The sobbing continues somewhere further into the keep. From this point, you can either go west or north.

rooms.name: Ackbrin Run
rooms.description: Small, blue orbs follow your progress, illuminating the walkway. You have reached a turn in Ackbrin Run. The sobbing continues somewhere further into the keep. From this point, you can either go east or north.

rooms.name: High Above Deimos Path
rooms.description: From this vantage point, you can see the extent of damage inflicted on the once mighty Demise Keep.  The most apparent observation is the centralization of the blast which destroyed much of the keep.  The entire northwestern section of this territory has been entirely leveled, only the blackened remains of the great explosion visible.  Skeletal trees line that perimeter, silent mourners of the souls lost.

rooms.name: High Above Deimos Path
rooms.description: You can almost touch the remains of the last standing tower of Demise Keep as you sail past it.  The surrounding forest looks even more ominous from this angle, as it would appear that all of their limbs are pointing towards you.
